description.mekanismgenerators.advanced_: An advanced generator that directly absorbs th' sun's rays wit' wee loss t' produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.bio_gener: A generator that burns organic materials of the world to produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.electroma: A block that converts kinetic energy from a Rotational Complex into usable electricity. These can be placed in any arrangement above your Rotational Complex, as long as they are all touching each other and the complex itself.
description.mekanismgenerators.gas_burni: A generator that there 'arnesses the varyin' molecularrr gases to produce lightnin'.
description.mekanismgenerators.heat_gene: A generator that uses the heat of lava or other burnable resources to produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.laser_foc: A panel of Reactor Glass that is capable of absorbing optical energy and thereby heating up the Fusion Reactor.
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor.l: The reactor's core heat capacity has been met
The reactor has insufficient fuel to sustain a reaction
Will not emit a redstone signal
Reactor has reached the required heat level to ignite
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor_c: The controlling block for the entire Fusion Reactor structure.
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor_f: Reinforced framing that can be used in the Fusion Reactor multiblock.
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor_g: Reinforced glass that can be used in the Fusion Reactor multiblock.
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor_l: A block that can be used to allow basic monitoring of a reactor using redstone.
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor_p: A block of reinforced framing that is capable of managing both the gas and energy transfer of the Fusion Reactor.
description.mekanismgenerators.rotationa: A connector that be placed on th' highest Turbine Rotor o' an Industrial Turbine t' carry kinetic energy into its Electromagnetic Coils.
description.mekanismgenerators.saturatin: A block that condenses steam processed by an Industrial Turbine into reusable water. These can be placed in any arrangement above your rotational complex.
description.mekanismgenerators.solar_gen: A generator that uses th' power o' th' sun t' produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.turbine_c: Pressure-resistant casing used in the creation of an Industrial Turbine.
description.mekanismgenerators.turbine_r: The steel rod that is used to house Turbine Blades within an Industrial Turbine.
description.mekanismgenerators.turbine_v: A type of Turbine Casing that includes a port for the transfer of energy and steam.
A type of Turbine Casing with an integrated vent for the release of steam. These should be placed on the level of or above the turbine's Rotational Complex.
description.mekanismgenerators.wind_gene: A generator that uses the strength of the wind to produce energy, with greater efficiency at higher levels.
Toggled Reactor Port eject mode to: %s.
reactor.mekanismgenerators.logic.deplete: Arr, we need more fuel matey!
tooltip.mekanismgenerators.hohlraum.insu: Arr, we need more fuel matey!
wind_generator.mekanismgenerators.sky_bl: Arr, I can't seem to find the sky
